text: waqtlu aladhin yuqatilunakum min almushrikin hayth wjdtmwhm, wa'akhrijuhum min almakan aldhy 'akhrajukum minh wahu "mk". walfitnat -why alkufr walshrk walsd ean al'islam- 'ashadu min qtlkm 'iyahm. wala tbdwwhm balqtal eind almasjid alharam tezymana lhrmath hataa ybdwwkm balqtal fyh, fa'iin qatalukum fi almasjid alharam faqtuluhum fyh. mithl dhlk aljaza' alrade yakun jaza'an alkafryn
